byline.contributor: Deepak Adhikari reported from Kathmandu, and Nida Najar from New Delhi.
byline.original: By DEEPAK ADHIKARI and NIDA NAJAR

abstract: Indian man Ashish Kumar Ram is killed in Nepal during clashes between protesters and police near country's border with India; demonstrators, many from ethnic group Madhesi, had been fighting against new Constitution that they say was not inclusive enough.
lead_paragraph: An Indian man was killed as the Nepalese police fired tear gas and bullets at demonstrators near a major border crossing into India.

headline.main: One Dead as Protesters and Police Clash in Nepal
headline.print_headline: Protesters and Police Clash in Nepal

snippet: An Indian man was killed as the Nepalese police fired tear gas and bullets at demonstrators near a major border crossing into India.
